detail_desc: Jacket in patterned cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short corduroy skirt with a regular waist and buttons at the top. Unlined.
Nursing bra in soft microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.

Joggers in sturdy, slightly heavier jersey made from a cotton blend with covered elastication, a drawstring and a press-stud at the waist. Diagonal welt pockets at the front and one welt back pocket. Straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top.

High profile Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Linings in woven fabric made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Patterned soles. Heel 5 cm.
Calf-length dress in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Covered buttons down the front, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.

Long-sleeved nursing dress in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Wide neckline and double-layered top at the front for easier nursing access, and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist.
Pull-on trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with a ribbed waistband, fake fly with a button at the front, fake front pockets and open back pockets.
Hair set with two hair clips and two hair elastics decorated with tulle bows. Length of hair clips 5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Fitted polo-neck top in stretch, ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow on the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with a matching accessory. T-shirt with long, double-layered mesh sleeves. Detachable, padded guitar with a hook and loop fastening.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck and decorative seam front and back. Long dolman sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in jersey crêpe made from an airy silk blend. Polo neck with a V-shaped seam at the front and extra-long sleeves.

Knee-length, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tie detail at one side. Long sleeves and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved, patterned jumper in fine-knit cotton with narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Rounded hem, longer at the back.

Wide jacket in a longer style in soft, washed denim with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt to accentuate the waist. Buttoned cuffs, side pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Fitted, sleeveless, knee-length dress in a stretch weave with a round neckline and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a close-fitting skirt with decorative buttons and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elastic hem. Light support. Partly lined in mesh.

Short dress in a viscose weave with notch lapels, covered buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a polyester filling. Detachable, lined hood with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Zip down the front, chest pocket, flap side pockets with a press-stud and one zipped sleeve pocket. Adjustable hook and loop tabs and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake front pockets with zips.
Platform sandals in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 13.5 cm.
Straight, knee-length dress in a soft knit with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Loafers with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Vest top in printed jersey with an asymmetric, overlocked hem.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and press-studs at the back of the neck.
Dress in patterned airy mesh. Long raglan sleeves with a flounce and cuff, a seam at the waist and a wide skirt. Jersey underdress.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves with ribbing along the top, and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a zip and slit at the back. Lined.
Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with visible seams at the front and slits at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a smocked weave that is fitted down to the knee and finishes in a wide flounce. High waist with wide, covered elastication. Unlined.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Joggers in airy, lightweight jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Shirt in soft, lightweight premium cotton flannel with a cutaway collar and French front. Open chest pocket, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Treggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Fleece duffle coat with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a high collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves.
Body in glittery jersey with lightly padded cups to shape the bust and provide good support, and a low-cut back. Adjustable shoulder straps, high-cut legs and a lined gusset.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Jacket in a herringbone weave made from a linen and cotton blend. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, a fake chest pocket and open front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined at the top.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long cardigan in a soft, horizontal knit with long dolman sleeves. Stocking-stitched edge around the opening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (6.5-10.5) and one pair in a child size.
Cropped, smocked top in woven fabric with a small frill trim at the top and bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Chunky-soled trainers with a padded top edge and a tongue and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft rib knit with long sleeves and a tie detail at the top.
Chunky metal hoop earrings. Diameter 7 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turn-up at the hem.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with glittery details, a hook and loop fastening at the front, a padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Front pockets, a fake back pocket with a flap and flap leg pockets.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave. Smocked neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front, short raglan sleeves, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).

Calf-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam and a sewn-on tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Metal earrings with polished plastic stones. Length approx. 4 cm.
